section.para: To deploy SystemTap, you need to install the SystemTap packages along with the corresponding set of -devel and -debuginfo packages for your kernel. This means that if your system has multiple kernels installed, and you wish to use SystemTap on more than one kernel kernel, you will need to install the -devel and -debuginfo packages for each of those kernel versions.
